name: New Scoring System
description:
<<< EXPERIMENTAL! >>>
Add the new scoring system in gameplay

name: Miss Judgement
description: Show miss judgements on combo break (upcoming feature?)

name: Note Effects in Pixel UI
description: Show the notesplashes and hold cover effects in pixel UI (hidden since FNF 0.3.0)

name: Miss on Ghost Tap
description: Break combo and cause a miss on ghost tap (disabled since FNF 0.3.0)

name: Combo Break on Bad/Shit Hits
description:
Break combo when hitting a Bad or a Shit
(enabled since FNF 0.3.0)

name: Accurate Note Colors
description: Color notesplashes and pressed notes to be closer to their original (pre note RGB), more vibrant colors. Supports custom colors
